data.speaker: Friend
data.content: Hey, you ok? Class just ended.

data.speaker: Player
data.content: Oh my god! I'm so embarrassed... I can't believe I slept through my first class!

data.speaker: Friend
data.content: No worries, you didn't miss much. We can go over my notes together if you want.

data.speaker: Friend
data.content: You hungry? There's a killer noodle spot upstairs in the food court

data.speaker: Friend
data.content: Awesome! I'm Lev by the way
